name: Viscera Cleanup Detail - House of Horror
summary:
Long ago in the early 1990's, on a gloomy Halloween night in an old, cursed house, a wicked force began to stir. Foolish mortals dabbled in things they did not understand and could not comprehend. Evil was unleashed. The hapless fools that brought chaos back into the world were slaughtered..

And now it falls to you to set things right. You must wash away the stains of evil.
So get your mop ready once more and clean this mess up!
info:
• 中文名: 内脏清洁工 - 恐怖屋
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 模拟
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年10月30日
